properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 10 DEC BY
   M/V TEKNIK PERDANA TOWING 5.4 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   01-40.00S 045-40.40W, 00-52.03S 046-11.03W,
   00-24.30S 043-02.47W, 01-10.59S 043-40.93W,
   01-25.18S 041-26.22W, 02-15.67S 041-26.22W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 11 DEC 12.
